According to the principle of two-way choice, apprentices, schools and enterprises sign a tripartite agreement. For apprentices who have reached the age of 16 but have not reached the age of 18, an agreement must be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises to determine the rights and interests of all parties and the specific posts, teaching contents and rights and interests protection of apprentices on the job.".
